UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Key role of the loop connecting the two beta strands of mussel defensin in its antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Granier C, Roch P, Richard V, Molina F, Romestand B

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus ATCC 4698(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25293(MIC=17µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=41µM),Bacillus megaterium ATCC 17749(MIC=34µM),Vibrio alginolyticus ATCC 17749(MIC=>75µM),Vibrio metschnikovii NCTC 8483(MIC=>75µM),Escherichia coli 363 ATCC 11775(MIC=62µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Newport(MIC=>75µM),Fusarium oxysporum(MIC=13µM),Candida sp.(MIC=8µM),Human lymphomyeloid K563 cells(no activity data)
